languages.text: {n}Абеляр трясущимися руками шарит в мусоре, по-прежнему не узнавая вас.{/n} "Катарина?.. Да, уже скоро... Позови детей..."
{n}With shaking hands, Abelard is still sifting through refuse, oblivious to you.{/n} "Quatharina? Yes, it's almost time... Call the children..."
languages.original_text: {n}Абеляр трясущимися руками шарит в мусоре, по-прежнему не узнавая вас.{/n} "Катарина?.. Да, уже скоро... Позови детей..."

traits.locale_text: {n}With shaking hands, Abelard is still sifting through refuse without recognising you.{/n} "Quatharina? Yes, it's almost time... Call the children..."

{n}With shaking hands, Abelard is still sifting through refuse, oblivious to you.{/n} "Quatharina? Yes, it's almost time... Call the children..."

languages.text: {n}Con manos temblorosas, Abelard sigue rebuscando en la basura sin percatarse de tu presencia.{/n} «¿Quatharina? Sí, casi es la hora... llama a los niños...».
languages.original_text: {n}With shaking hands, Abelard is still sifting through refuse, oblivious to you.{/n} "Quatharina? Yes, it's almost time... Call the children..."

traits.locale_text: {n}Con manos temblorosas, Abelard sigue rebuscando en la basura sin percatarse de tu presencia.{/n} «¿Quatharina? Sí, casi es la hora... llama a los niños...».

languages.text: {n}アベラルドは震える手でまだゴミを漁っており、あなたに気づいていない。{/n}「クアサリナ？そう、もうすぐ時間だ…子供たちを呼べ…」
languages.original_text: {n}With shaking hands, Abelard is still sifting through refuse, oblivious to you.{/n} "Quatharina? Yes, it's almost time... Call the children..."

traits.locale_text: {n}アベラルドは震える手でまだゴミを漁っており、あなたに気づいていない。{/n}「クアサリナ？そう、もうすぐ時間だ…子供たちを呼べ…」

languages.text: {n}阿贝拉德的双手颤抖着，依然翻着垃圾，对你视而不见。{/n}“奎莎莉娜？没错，差不多是时候了……把孩子们叫来吧……”
languages.original_text: {n}With shaking hands, Abelard is still sifting through refuse, oblivious to you.{/n} "Quatharina? Yes, it's almost time... Call the children..."

traits.locale_text: {n}阿贝拉德的双手颤抖着，依然翻着垃圾，对你视而不见。{/n}“奎莎莉娜？没错，差不多是时候了……把孩子们叫来吧……”

languages.text: {n}Les mains tremblantes, Abélard continue de fouiller dans les détritus sans vous accorder la moindre attention.{/n} « Quatharina ? Oui, l'heure est presque venue... Appelle les enfants... »
languages.original_text: {n}With shaking hands, Abelard is still sifting through refuse, oblivious to you.{/n} "Quatharina? Yes, it's almost time... Call the children..."

traits.locale_text: {n}Les mains tremblantes, Abélard continue de fouiller dans les détritus sans vous accorder la moindre attention.{/n} « Quatharina ? Oui, l'heure est presque venue... Appelle les enfants... »

languages.text: {n}Abelard durchwühlt noch immer mit zitternden Händen den Abfall und bemerkt dich gar nicht.{/n} "Quatharina? Ja, es ist bald so weit ... Ruft die Kinder ..."
languages.original_text: {n}With shaking hands, Abelard is still sifting through refuse, oblivious to you.{/n} "Quatharina? Yes, it's almost time... Call the children..."

traits.locale_text: {n}Abelard durchwühlt noch immer mit zitternden Händen den Abfall und bemerkt dich gar nicht.{/n} "Quatharina? Ja, es ist bald so weit ... Ruft die Kinder ..."

languages.text: {n}Abelard, titreyen elleriyle hâlâ atıkları karıştırıyor. Varlığının farkında bile değil.{/n} "Quatharina? Evet, neredeyse vakti geldi... Çocukları çağır..."
languages.original_text: {n}With shaking hands, Abelard is still sifting through refuse, oblivious to you.{/n} "Quatharina? Yes, it's almost time... Call the children..."
